shortDescription: TOTOLINK A3002RU-V2.0.0 B20190814.1034 allows authenticated remote users to modify the system's 'Run Command'. An attacker can use this functionality to execute arbitrary OS commands on the router.
vulnerabilityName: totolink a3002r_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
